citations.narrative:
The registrant has not documented their required annual review of the contingency plan. Annual reviews of the
contingency plan help ensure that identified emergency situations and measures are adequately addressed for the
humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing and care of animals in the event of an emergency.
Contingency plans must be reviewed at least annually. The date of the review and any changes made to the contingency
plan must be documented. Facilities must provide training for their personnel regarding their roles and responsibilities as
outlined in the contingency plan within 30 days of their start date. Any substantive changes to the plan must be
communicated to employees through training which must be conducted within 30 days of making the changes.
Correct by 05 March 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.38(l)(2) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
The registrant has not documented their required annual review of the contingency plan. Annual reviews of the 
contingency plan help ensure that identified emergency situations and measures are adequately addressed for the 
humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing and care of animals in the event of an emergency. 
 
Contingency plans must be reviewed at least annually. The date of the review and any changes made to the contingency 
plan must be documented. Facilities must provide training for their personnel regarding their roles and responsibilities as 
outlined in the contingency plan within 30 days of their start date. Any substantive changes to the plan must be 
communicated to employees through training which must be conducted within 30 days of making the changes. 
 
Correct by 05 March 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
